text_block_list.text: It had been a while since I had become Zenno Rob Roy's trainer――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Good work today too. I'm looking forward to tomorrow also.
Thinking about it―― I reached for the documents sitting on my desk. I had gathered these to use in future training.
choice_data_list: Read these when you get a chance

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ah, okay! Thank you very much. I'll be sure to read them carefully.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (There are so many books next to those documents…… they have book covers on them but, if they're that thick, they must be some kind of technical training books)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (I've seen them yawning in the morning, so they must be staying up late studying them……)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Eh? ……Ah, S-sorry! Um, well……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: N-no no! I'm fine, don't worry about it. I just had something on my mind, that's all……!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (Oh no, I'm making them worry about me……!)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (……but, that's just how they are. Trainer-san is always worrying about me, and encouraging me)
『Don't lose!』
『You're the main character, Rob Roy!!』
『You're the main character, Rob Roy!!』

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (It's wasted on me…… isn't it?)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (But, they said I'm a 『Hero』)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……Hehe, ehehe.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Oh, you're in a good mood～. Rob Roy, did something good happen?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ah…… S-sorry. Um, well…… I was laughing now because…… ummmm……

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Wait, wait! Let me guess. Hmmm～……Ah! I got it～! You found a funny book! It has to be that. So, was I right!?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……Fufuu. Well, the truth is――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: And they often ask if something's troubling me. They're always looking after me, they're a kind person.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: And they're really studious. Today, they had a bunch of materials gathered up too. They're serious when it comes to training……

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Ehh～! You're so lucky. I want to find a trainer like that too～!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ehe, ehehe……

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: So someone like that really exists, huh…… that's amazing. Almost like someone right out of a novel!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: That's true…… they're almost like someone from a novel, probably.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I mean, Trainer-san is kind, hard-working, sincere…… they must be like a hero, sticking to their beliefs and pushing forward――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……? Huh?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Just now…… I said 『They must be like a hero』……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (……I've always thought that Trainer-san is "that type of person"…… but)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm～. I wonder though…… It's possible, that I've been one-sidedly…… but…… hmmm……
Zenno Rob Roy continued mumbling to herself while gazing at the sky from her window. That day, she was unable to find an answer.
